code: import{useCallback}from'react';import useBombFinance from'./useBombFinance';import useHandleTransactionReceipt from'./useHandleTransactionReceipt';var useHarvest=function useHarvest(bank){var bombFinance=useBombFinance();var handleTransactionReceipt=useHandleTransactionReceipt();var handleReward=useCallback(function(){handleTransactionReceipt(bombFinance.harvest(bank.contract,bank.poolId),"Claim ".concat(bank.earnTokenName," from ").concat(bank.contract));},[bank,bombFinance,handleTransactionReceipt]);return{onReward:handleReward};};export default useHarvest;
